main event: A pilot reported seeing a bright orange-yellow round object while flying over Ontario, California.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for just 3 seconds,The object experienced severe turbulence when crossing paths with the pilot's aircraft,The object was noted to be traveling at an estimated track speed of 600 knots (approximately 700 mph),There were negative detections of the flying object by ground radar,The pilot was confirmed to be a private pilot flying a Cessna-145 aircraft.
witness description: James Gibson, a 19-year-old male, private pilot flying a Cessna-145 aircraft
